import React from 'react'; import './Play.css'; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import ActualGame from '../ActualGame/ActualGame'; const Play = () => { const [currentUrl, setCurrentUrl] = useState(''); const [showRules, setShowRules] = useState(false); const [numCards, setNumCards] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { // Update the currentUrl state with the current window URL setCurrentUrl(window.location.href); }, []); // Function to handle slider value change const handleSliderChange = (value) => { console.log(numCards) setNumCards(value); console.log("numcards", numCards); }; const handleCopy = () => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(currentUrl); }; const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleStartGame = () => { setShowRules(true); }; const handleSave = () => { navigate('/game/phish-game/room/:roomId/quickfire') }; return (
{showRules ? (

); } export default Play;
